name: Wrecked Destruction Simulator
description: Want to see Grandma get hit by a Semi Truck? Make it happen Want to see an old man walk into an exploding napalm canister? Make it happen Want to see an F1 car slam through a cow and ploy through a TV? Make it happen While in Early Access, the game will be updated 100% based on the community.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4Ghz Quad Core Memory: 6 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
